column1: Is the founder educated at an Ivy League institution?
Has the founder co-founded a company with a small team?
Does the founder have previous startup experience?
Has the founder held a C-level role at a public tech company?
Has the founder's company achieved previous startup acquisitions?
Does the founder have a background in finance?
Has the founder received significant press and media coverage?
Is the founder's company based in California?
Does the founder have advanced degrees in a technical field?
Has the founder worked full-time at a large number of companies?
